<div>

  Dear wanderer, welcome to my [#30DayMapChallenge](https://30daymapchallenge.com/) gallery!

  Each map you see here corresponds to a daily challenge from the 2025 edition of the   [#30DayMapChallenge](https://30daymapchallenge.com/). Some maps are most likely complete, while others are works in progress or placeholders for future creations. For instance, adding annotations whenever time lacked to do so.

  I take the challenge as a learning and sharing time, exploring new techniques, tools, and datasets. Feel free to check the code behind each map by clicking on the thumbnails.

  üçÇ Have fun, explore, and reuse!

  ---Guillaume Noblet

</div>
